Description: Limestone ostracon: on the recto seven lines of a hymn to Amun of Thebes, written by a draughtsman Sahor(?), dated in a year 3, first month of 'prt', day 12. On the verso four short lines (the last two very faint) of a memorandum dated in a year 6, first month of 'prt', day 8.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (136372) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/136372)
Associated places: Named in inscription: Thebes (historic - Upper Egypt)
